oshiSkill.name: 野兎たち~  ("Wild Rabbits")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Usable during your opponent's turn when one of your Holomen is knocked down: Reassign all green cheers from your one of your downed Holomen to your other Holomen.

spOshiSkill.name: 幸運兎  ("Lucky Rabbit")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] During this turn, treat all your dice rolls as 6

oshiSkill.name: ほうき星  ("Comet")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] When this Oshimen or your blue Holomen deal damage to opp backline's Holomen, you may use this to deal 50 special damage to one of opp backline's holomen

spOshiSkill.name: シューティングスター  ("Shooting Star")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] When your blue holomen deal damage to opp's center holomen or collab holomen, you may use this to deal same amount of special damage to one of opp backline holomen

Lui's Party
skills.description: You may archive 1 card from your hand: Reveal 1 non-Buzz '1st' Holomen from your deck and add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck

name: Takane Lui
bloomeffect: 本当にみんなのおかげ!!: When this Holomen Blooms from Debut, you may archive 1 card from your hand: Draw 2 cards from your deck.

skills.name: しっかりついてきてよね!!

name: Takane Lui
bloomeffect: 組織の司令塔: You may return 1 to 2 HooX cards from your archive to your hand.

skills.name: ホークレイヴ
skills.description: You can archive 1 to 5 cards from your hand. Deal 20 special damage to either the opponent's Center Holomen or Collaboration Holomen for each card archived.

name: Kobo Kanaeru
extraEffect: This Holomen can be included in your deck in any number of copies.

name: Usada Pekora
collabEffect: それは「冒険」: You can roll a die once: If the result is even, reveal one Buzz Holomen from your deck and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

skills.name: ぺこら~扉の向こう側へ~

name: Shiranui Flare
collabEffect: それは「愛と絆の物語」: Swap your center Holomen with one of your back Holomen that is not resting.

name: Shirogane Noel

skills.name: ノエル~扉の向こう側へ~

name: Houshou Marine
collabEffect: それは「エジンバラ城」: Roll a die once. If the result is odd, swap the opponent's center Holomen with one of their back Holomen.

skills.name: マリン~扉の向こう側へ~

name: ペンライト (Penlight)
ability: You can only use this card if you archive 1 of your Holo Power cards.Reveal 1 Cheer card from your Cheer Deck that matches the color of one of your Holomen and send it to that Holomen. Then shuffle your Cheer Deck.

name: じゃあ敵だね
ability: Switch your opponent's Center Holomen with one of their Back Holomen.

name: 月と兎の物語 (Story of the Moon and the Rabbit)
ability: You can only use this card if your hand, excluding this card, has 6 or fewer cards. Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. From those, reveal any number of [Usada Pekora] and [Moona Hoshinova] cards, and add the revealed Holomen to your hand. Then, return the remaining cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Whack with a Blunt Object!
ability: Roll a die: If the result is 3 or less, archive 1 of the opponent's Holomen's Cheers. If your Oshi Holomen is [Nanashi Mumei], you may change the ability [Once per game] Archive 2 of the opponent's Center Holomen's Cheers.

name: 星街すいせいのマイク (Suisei's Mic)
ability: This tool provides the attached Holomen with +10 Arts.If attached to a [Hoshimachi Suisei] of 1st or higher, add the following ability: When the Holomen with this tool causes an opponent's Holomen to be knocked out, send 1 card from the top of your Cheer Deck to this Holomen.A tool can only be attached to one Holomen at a time.

name: あん肝 (Ankimo)
ability: This mascot provides the attached Holomen with +10 HP. If attached to [Tokino Sora], add the following ability: When the Holomen attached to this mascot uses an arts ability, this mascot is also treated as a cheer card.A mascot can only be attached to one Holomen at a time.

name: 野うさぎ同盟 (Nousagi Alliance)
ability: When the Holomen with this fan attached rolls a die as part of an ability, you may archive this fan: Reroll the die once. This fan can only be attached to your 'Usada Pekora,' and any number of them can be attached to one Holomen.

name: 開拓者 (pioneer)
ability: During your opponent's turn, when the Holomen attached to this fan is knocked down, you may transfer 1 cheer card from the Holomen attached to this fan to another one of your Holomen. This fan can only be attached to your [AZKI] and can be attached in any number.
